alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Laurel; Pulaski; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 8:32PM EDT until July 02 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Laurel County in south central Kentucky... Northeastern Pulaski County in south central Kentucky... West central Jackson County in southeastern Kentucky... Rockcastle County in south central Kentucky... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 831 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ottowa, or 8 miles west of Mount Vernon, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bromo around 835 PM EDT. Mount Vernon around 840 PM EDT. Flat Rock around 845 PM EDT. Donaro around 850 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Horse Lick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
